article_title: Gaza aid fears as Israel bans UN Palestinian refugee agency
sentence: Israel  launched  a  campaign  to  destroy  Hamas  in  response  to  its  7  October  attack  on  Israel,  in  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  251  others  were  taken  hostage.

article_title: Gaza aid fears as Israel bans UN Palestinian refugee agency
sentence: At  least  42,924  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry,  which  does  not  distinguish  between  fighters  and  civilians  in  its  figures.
